placeholders.shipping-from: Enter the address of the pickup location
placeholders.shipping-to: Enter the address of the delivery location

sender.title: Shipment Details
sender.description: Here you can view the details of the shipment and manage it.

section-1.description: With our platform Sawaeed Logistics, we provide an advanced and innovative logistics experience, where companies and individual drivers can easily join to search for job opportunities, and customers can easily find the right driver. Our platform combines technological advancement and exceptional logistics service to efficiently and effectively meet all shipping and delivery needs with high efficiency and quality.

section-2.title: Our solutions in Sawaeed Logistics bring together customers and opportunities in a skilled and efficient manner
section-2.description: We understand that your needs may vary, so we offer a comprehensive range of services. Whether you are looking for fast or economical shipping, we provide you with options that perfectly suit your needs and budget. Thanks to the diversity of our services, you can access outstanding logistics solutions that meet your aspirations in all areas of shipping and delivery.

service-1.description-1: We rely on the latest technologies in developing our platform, ensuring a seamless and efficient experience for all users.
service-1.description-2: The application is designed to be easily accessible to everyone, whether senders or recipients, providing them with the optimal experience.
service-1.description-3: Whether you need international or local shipping, or even storage and distribution services, we provide everything you need under one roof.
service-1.description-4: We ensure the safety and quality of shipments throughout the process, guaranteeing the satisfaction and trust of our customers in our services.

section-3.description: Sawaeed Logistics is not just a platform for shipping and delivery, but a embodiment of innovation and excellence in the logistics world, where we strive to meet and exceed our customers' expectations every time.

section-question-1.title-1: You can find all the necessary information to assist you here.
section-question-1.title-2: We are at your service for any inquiry you may have.
section-question-1.question: Do you still need assistance?

section-1.title-1: Join the Sawaeed Logistics commercial franchise network
section-1.description: With our Sawaeed Logistics platform, we offer an advanced and innovative logistics experience, where companies and individual drivers can easily join to search for job opportunities,

section-2.description-1: Get more information about our unique approach to doing business and register your request now to join our global network of commercial franchises. Commercial franchises are a fundamental pillar of the comprehensive growth strategy we follow in both developed and emerging markets. Commercial franchise owners possess the tools of success, as they enjoy the support of our customer-centric solutions, our extensive operational experience, and our innovative technologies. We welcome entrepreneurs and companies with a distinctive presence who have the required experience in our business sector and are characterized by creativity and innovation to join the Sawaeed Logistics network and become part of our unique and vibrant growth story.
section-2.description-2: You can easily and conveniently submit a request to join our commercial franchise network, where you can fill out the application form and send it to us directly. After receiving your request, our specialized team will review it and communicate with you to discuss the details and next steps.

common.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

section-1.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads and content tailored to you, as well as analyze visits to our website. By clicking Accept All, you consent to our use of cookies.

web-home.download: Download the app on your mobile
web-home.question: Questions
web-home.banner-1: Seamless delivery solutions for your business
web-home.content-1: Now the only thing you have to touch is your phone. Your parcels are always on hand.
web-home.content-2: Welcome to “Sawaed Logistics”, the application that embodies the spirit of progress and ease in the world of shipping and delivery. We take pride in offering an advanced and efficient platform that combines ease of use and distinguished logistical service...
web-home.content-3: At Sawaeed Logistics, we realize that your needs vary, which is why we offer a wide range of services. Whether you need fast or economical shipping, we have options that fit your needs and budget.
web-home.banner-4: Manage all your shipments in one place
web-home.content-4: Take advantage of our services and solutions designed to meet all your shipping needs.
web-home.content-5: Go with “Sawaed Logistics” and enjoy the best experience in sending parcels. Download the application now and start your journey with us
web-home.content-6: Join the 'Sawaeed Logistics' family today and enjoy a unique experience in the world of sending parcels. Whether you want to send a surprise gift or move large goods, we are here to make the process easy and efficient.
web-home.warningcontent: Common warning signs of fraudulent attempts via mail, text or online,...
web-home.contact-welcome: We are always keen to provide and guarantee the best services to our dear customers
web-home.contact-question: How can we serve you today?
web-home.complain-text: If there are any problems you encounter, please do not hesitate to contact us
